de.adorsys.keymanagement.juggler.services

Interface BCJuggler.Builder

  • Enclosing interface:
    BCJuggler

    @Component.Builder
public static interface BCJuggler.Builder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BCJuggler build() 
      BCJuggler.Builder keyStoreConfig(KeyStoreConfig config)
      Configures default keystore type and encryption, can be overridden by withConfig method.
      BCJuggler.Builder metadataConfig(MetadataPersistenceConfig config)
      Tells which metadata class to persist within KeyStore and how to serialize/deserialize it.
      BCJuggler.Builder metadataPersister(KeyMetadataPersistence persistence)
      Tells how to persist class provided by MetadataPersistenceConfig.

    • Method Detail

      • metadataConfig

        @BindsInstance
BCJuggler.Builder metadataConfig(@Nullable
                                                MetadataPersistenceConfig config)
        Tells which metadata class to persist within KeyStore and how to serialize/deserialize it.

      • keyStoreConfig

        @BindsInstance
BCJuggler.Builder keyStoreConfig(@Nullable
                                                KeyStoreConfig config)
        Configures default keystore type and encryption, can be overridden by withConfig method.

      • metadataPersister

        @BindsInstance
BCJuggler.Builder metadataPersister(@Nullable
                                                   KeyMetadataPersistence persistence)
        Tells how to persist class provided by MetadataPersistenceConfig. Most probably you want to pass WithPersister class here.

      • build

        BCJuggler build()
